ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup self-rising cornbread mix (such as Martha White®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup olive oil, or more as needed

cookingTips: Use thin slices so they fry quickly and stay tender inside with crispy exterior
Don't overcrowd the pan to maintain oil temperature and prevent steaming
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through coating thin squash slices in cornbread mix and frying until golden for a classic Southern side dish.
